ProductCard

components.name: AuthStatusIconComponent
components.templateData:
<svg width="24" height="24">
  @if (isAuthenticated()) {
    <use href="#user-logged-in" />
  } @else {
    <use href="#user-logged-out" />
  }
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon">
  <!-- Logged In Icon -->
  <symbol id="user-logged-in" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon">
    <circle cx="12" cy="8" r="4" fill="currentColor" />
    <path
      d="M4 20C4 17.2386 6.23858 15 9 15H15C17.7614 15 20 17.2386 20 20C20 21.1046 19.1046 22 18 22H6C4.89543 22 4 21.1046 4 20Z"
      fill="currentColor"
    />
    <circle cx="19" cy="5" r="3" fill="#22c55e" />
  </symbol>

  <!-- Logged Out Icon -->
  <symbol id="user-logged-out" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon">
    <circle cx="12" cy="8" r="4" fill="currentColor" opacity="0.5" />
    <path
      d="M4 20C4 17.2386 6.23858 15 9 15H15C17.7614 15 20 17.2386 20 20C20 21.1046 19.1046 22 18 22H6C4.89543 22 4 21.1046 4 20Z"
      fill="currentColor"
      opacity="0.5"
    />
    <circle cx="19" cy="5" r="3" fill="#ef4444" />
  </symbol>
</svg>

components.name: BadgeComponent
ButtonComponent
CardComponent
DarkModeToggleComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  class="toggle-button"
  aria-label="Toggle dark mode"
  [class.dark]="darkMode()"
  (click)="toggleTheme()"
>
  <svg
    class="sun-icon"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    stroke-width="2"
    stroke-linecap="round"
    stroke-linejoin="round"
  >
    <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="5" />
    <line x1="12" y1="1" x2="12" y2="3" />
    <line x1="12" y1="21" x2="12" y2="23" />
    <line x1="4.22" y1="4.22" x2="5.64" y2="5.64" />
    <line x1="18.36" y1="18.36" x2="19.78" y2="19.78" />
    <line x1="1" y1="12" x2="3" y2="12" />
    <line x1="21" y1="12" x2="23" y2="12" />
    <line x1="4.22" y1="19.78" x2="5.64" y2="18.36" />
    <line x1="18.36" y1="5.64" x2="19.78" y2="4.22" />
  </svg>
  <svg
    class="moon-icon"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    fill="none"
    stroke="currentColor"
    stroke-width="2"
    stroke-linecap="round"
    stroke-linejoin="round"
  >
    <path d="M21 12.79A9 9 0 1 1 11.21 3 7 7 0 0 0 21 12.79z" />
  </svg>
</button>

components.name: ProductComponent
components.templateData:
<ui-product-card [product]="product()" [class]="product().type">
  <!-- Choose a badge -->
  @switch (product().type) {
    @case ('limited') {
      <ui-badge variant="secondary">Limited!</ui-badge>
    }
    @case ('out-of-stock') {
      <ui-badge variant="neutral">Out of Stock!</ui-badge>
    }
  }

  <!-- Choose a button -->
  @switch (product().type) {
    @case ('default') {
      <ui-button footer (click)="addToCart.emit(product())"
        >Add to Cart</ui-button
      >
    }
    @case ('limited') {
      <ui-button footer variant="secondary" (click)="addToCart.emit(product())"
        >Add to Cart</ui-button
      >
    }
    @case ('out-of-stock') {
      <ui-button
        footer
        [disabled]="true"
        disabledMessage="Better luck next time!"
        >Add to Cart</ui-button
      >
    }
  }
</ui-product-card>
